titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation, for quieting the Post-Master-General in the execution of his office.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty, 1660. At the King's Printing-House in Black-Friers,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at the Court at Whitehall, the sixteenth day of January, in the twelfth year of His Majesties Reign, one thousand six hundred and sixty.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
